meanings.definition: An administrative division in some countries, especially in India.
meanings.sent1: The taluka was responsible for overseeing the local schools and hospitals.
meanings.sent2: The government official visited the taluka to assess the infrastructure.
meanings.sent3: The taluka decided to host a talent show for all the villages.
meanings.sent4: The taluka was the heart of the community, connecting people from different backgrounds.
meanings.sent5: Living in the taluka felt like being part of a big family.

meanings.definition: A subdivision of a district or county.
meanings.sent1: Each taluka had its own unique traditions and customs.
meanings.sent2: The taluka was known for its fertile land and abundant crops.
meanings.sent3: The annual taluka picnic was a highlight for all residents.
meanings.sent4: The taluka acted as a bridge between the rural and urban areas.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the taluka felt like stepping into a different world.
